MemoryInfobox.description: 'After helping the people of Lakonia, Kassandra had become a local legend and earned her reward tenfold. Xanthe was always willing to acknowledge good service.'

General_Description: '''End of the Day''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Having helped the three women [[Xanthe]] had suggested, Kassandra returned to the magistrate of [[Pitana]].
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra returned to Xanthe at Pitana to turn in.
*'''Xanthe:''' ''Thank you for aiding all of us in Pitana. Stories of you will live amongst us for many years.''
Kassandra bowed.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I help where I can. But thank you.''
Xanthe picked something from her pocket.
*'''Xanthe:''' ''A reward, for all your help.''
Kassandra nodded gratefully.
Section_Outcome: Xanthe rewarded Kassandra for helping the women of Lakonia.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
